rev.desc.rev.desc: QCCR1E68781 - Change phase of a change is not using the new process designer phases or save process.

Panel: build.phase.queryChange: Changed the following expression from: $L.cm3cpqry="name isin "+str(phases in $CATEGORY)+"\"" To: $L.cm3cpqry="name isin "+str(jscall("changeManagementExtra.getPhaseValues", $CATEGORY))+"\""

Added a confirm.action panel that prompts users to confirm the phase change - selecting yes will save the record with the new phase. Changed check.phase.name and check.phase.name.a exits from phase.changed.msg to confirm.action.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.

descript.descript: QCCR1E68781 - Change phase of a change is not using the new process designer phases or save process.

Panel: build.phase.queryChange: Changed the following expression from: $L.cm3cpqry="name isin "+str(phases in $CATEGORY)+"\"" To: $L.cm3cpqry="name isin "+str(jscall("changeManagementExtra.getPhaseValues", $CATEGORY))+"\"" Added a confirm.action panel that prompts users to confirm the phase change - selecting yes will save the record with the new phase. Changed check.phase.name and check.phase.name.a exits from phase.changed.msg to confirm.action.
Added scmsg function for internationalization of messages.
